<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Troubadour's Cap](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2144)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 104 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 15,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cap

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This jaunty cap can take the form and color of any type of hat you wish upon investing the item, but it always has a peacock feather jutting out from one side. You gain a +2 item bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) and [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks while wearing the cap. When you invest the cap, you either increase your Charisma modifer by 1 or increase it to +4, whichever is higher.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You cast [_hypnotize_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1564) (DC 37).

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** Picking the feather from your cap, you throw it toward a target, casting [_prismatic spray_](/Spells.aspx?ID=233) (DC 35).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Troubadour's Cap
